articles.title: In 'considerable pain' after a fall, Elton John postpones tour for two years - CTV News
articles.description: Elton John says he is postponing European dates on his world tour until 2023 so that he can have an operation on an injured hip.

articles.author: Robin Schiller
articles.title: Gardaí arrest over 120 fugitives wanted for serious crimes since new alert system introduced - Independent.ie
articles.description: Over 120 fugitives wanted for serious crimes in Europe have been detained in Ireland since a new alert system was introduced earlier this year.
articles.content:
